array.string: Find the story lines beginning with "..." and replace them with your own story.
Add another story line using `lines.append(\"...\")`. Donâ€™t forget to add corresponding emoji to the `illustrations` array.
Add your own characters and things to wear! Make sure each is defined using a word followed by a space and then an emoji.
Add your own arrays with lists of, for example, monsters or weapons. Then use string interpolation in your story lines to insert random items from your arrays.
